title: MATZOBALL® ages 21-39 NYC December 24, 2015
desc: Bigger and better than ever, MatzoBall, the nations leading Jewish single?s event, kicks off its 29th year with an unforgettable Jewcy adventure.?With almost three decades of experience,  nobody can do it bigger or better than Matzoball and this year will prove to be no different. Matzoball sets the stage for the ultimate party experience that you do not want to miss out on!!? Gather a group of friends and get ready for the most epic one-night-stand of the year and join us for what USA Today dubs ?The Number 1 Holiday Party of the Year?. ? Capitale | New York?  130 Bowery New York December 24 th , 2015 Originally the Bowery Savings Bank, this national historic landmark was designed by Stanford White and built in 1893. Capitale?s interior features tall Corinthian columns, a beautifully decorated coved ceiling, and an art glass skylight making Capitale?s Ballroom one of New York?s great event spaces. ? For VIP reservations/sponsorship information contact: info@matzoball.org. Do not wait, Tickets will sell out and you do NOT want to miss this! (Ages 21-39)
